subject: AI & Agents
title: Chatbots That Handle Customer Service
description: A micro-lesson that makes Chatbots That Handle Customer Service usable.

hook.text: You type 'where is my package?' and get an instant answer. No human was involved.

buildup.text: Customer service chatbots classify your intent and pull data from order databases.

discovery.text: Modern bots handle returns, tracking, FAQs, and billing â€” the most common queries.

twist.text: When you ask something unusual, the bot loops. 'I'm sorry, I didn't understand that.'

climax.text: The best systems seamlessly hand off to a human when the AI reaches its limits.

punchline.text: Good bots know when to call a human.

quiz.question: What should a good customer service bot do when confused?
options: Hand off to a human agent seamlessly
